channel.title: When u make compiler and run does it make client?
channel.description: sorry for the dumb question im new but when you do the compile and run.bat does it open anything like a cleint or some thing because other wise i havn't got a clue were to edit it unless u leave run.bat open and go on moparscape? again im osrry for the noob question but i am litrally a noob :eek:

item.title: When u make compiler and run does it make client?
item.dc:creator: @bomzai bomzai
item.description:
@bomzai wrote:

No what the compiler does it basically update all ur archive files you have that will be needed to run a client or server. So the answer is that complier will not run a client unless you have the client already inside the same folder with all the necessary files to run the client.

Read full topic
item.source: When u make compiler and run does it make client?
